meanings.definition: A whip or lash used for punishment.
meanings.sent1: The cruel master used the azotes to punish the disobedient servant.
meanings.sent2: The azotes hung ominously on the wall of the dungeon.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the azotes, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the azotes striking the ground echoed through the courtyard.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the azotes made the villagers shudder in fear.

meanings.definition: To whip or beat with a lash.
meanings.sent1: The taskmaster would azotes the workers who did not meet their quotas.
meanings.sent2: She azotes the rug to remove the dust and dirt.
meanings.sent3: The chef azotes the cream until it forms stiff peaks for the dessert.
meanings.sent4: The storm azotes the trees, bending them to its will.
meanings.sent5: The waves azotes the shore relentlessly, shaping the coastline over time.
